Name: Nigel Catsburg
Content:
Ah yes Willy, he's been employeed here as valued member of our staff for over two decades now, he cleans up after us and is always so polite, and all he asks for in return is healthcare to help take care of his sick daughter.
 Did you know that some people have to actually pay for medicine? my daddy usually buys my botox injections, and thats kinda like Insulin shots, so I really feel for her.
